name: innerly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves feelings or thoughts that you do not show or tell other people: I was innerly delighted at the news, but said nothing. In spite of everything that was happening, I managed to remain innerly calm.
More examplesFewer examplesShe had an innerly sharp wit that only occasionally surfaced in conversation.The therapy was difficult, though innerly very productive.Few people are able to match their innerly held ideas about morality with their outer behaviour.
